## Project-ZERO Python dependencies
# This file was generated from the active virtual environment on 2025-08-28.
# Usage:
# 1) Create and activate a virtual environment (recommended):
#
#    python3 -m venv ~/zero-venv
#    source ~/zero-venv/bin/activate
#
# 2) Install dependencies:
#
#    pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel
#    pip install -r Software/requirements.txt
#
# Note: This project uses system camera bindings (libcamera) which are
# provided by the OS packages. If you run into import errors for
# `libcamera` or `picamera2`, install system packages:
#
#    sudo apt update
#    sudo apt install python3-libcamera python3-picamera2 libcap-dev
#
# The list below pins the packages currently used for development.
